greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = T(2*n,n), T given by A026736.
comment: Is this the same sequence as A111279? - _Andrew S. Plewe_, May 09 2007
Yes, see the Callan reference "A bijection...". - _Joerg Arndt_, Feb 29 2016
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
David Callan, A bijection for two sequences in OEIS, arXiv:1602.08347 [math.CO], 2016.
program: elif (mod(n,2)==0 and k==(n-2)/2): return T(n-1, k-1) + T(n-2, k-1) + T(n-1, k)
else: return T(n-1, k-1) + T(n-1, k)
[T(2*n, n) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 16 2019
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
